title: Inquis AI
description: [IN PROGRESS]A unified course assistant and content management system that significantly improved student engagement and learning efficiency by 21% through an integrated front-end and scalable back-end built with Flask and Firebase.

title: Live Flash Auctioning System
description: An innovative real-time auction platform featuring low-latency bidding, synchronized countdown timers, sniping prevention, and scalability using AWS services. Ensures seamless global participation and post-auction analytics for insights.

title: VibeCheck
description: A music-based social networking application integrating Spotify API for real-time user engagement. Deployed on AWS with Travis CI/CD and optimized latency by 50-60% using Redis Channels.

title: Roomio
description: An apartment rental and roommate finder web application, built with Django and PostgreSQL, focused on secure data transactions and user-centered design.

title: Store Inventory Management System
description: A Java Spring web application for store inventory management, integrating MySQL database for robust data handling.
